Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Menu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
implements MenuObservable
    Contains all the menu logic.

    quentin sauvage
    See Also:
    MenuObserver, Client

      • addGamesList

        public void addGamesList(java.lang.String host)
        Search for the games related to this host.
        Parameters:
        host - the host the menu wants to ask the games list.
        See Also:
        JsonReader

      • joinGame

        public void joinGame(java.lang.String game)
        Informs the server the user is joining the game.
        Parameters:
        game - the game the user want to join. If null, it means it created a new game, and will then automatically join it.

      • updateGameName

        public void updateGameName(java.lang.String game)
        Update the game name if needed, used to call the joining process.
        Parameters:
        game - the game the user want to join. If null, it means it created a new game.

      • createGame

        public void createGame(java.lang.String gameName,
                       java.lang.String mapName)
        Informs the server of the creation of a game.
        Parameters:
        gameName - the name of the game the user wants to create.
        mapName - the map name of the game the user wants to create.
